channel.title: Runeforce - Oldschool - PvP - Spawn - Sounds - 100% Combat - 2006 style
channel.description: [center][img]http://s30.postimg.org/60y0ob9dd/Untitled_1.png[/img] __________________________________________________________ [spoiler=INFO]Runeforce is a oldschool style from 2006. with 100% working combat and sounds, spawn and fight with others![/spoiler] [spoiler=MEDIA][img]http://s23.postimg.org/fvap8357v/Screenshot_4.png[/img] [img]http://s8.postimg.org/ix0fgi3ed/Screenshot_7.png[/img] [img]http://s2.postimg.org/4d0zo7ps5/Screenshot_9.png[/img] [img]http://s3.postimg.org/ls4ngwfub/Screenshot_10.png[/img] [img]http://s9.postimg.org/5krz5508b/Screenshot_11.png[/img] [img]http://s28.postimg.org/ap1kcq6yl/Screenshot_12.png[/img] [img]http://s27.postimg.org/tbz3t8533/Screenshot_13.png[/img] [img]http://s27.postimg.org/owla1pi2r/Screenshot_15.png[/img] [img]http://s3.postimg.org/719vizbqr/Screenshot_16.png[/img] [img]http://s11.postimg.org/as43rh7vn/Screenshot_17.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimg.org/srarc7m7f/Screenshot_18.png[/img] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fIkx_DLRlsE[/youtube] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nNAtjkAoO8A&feature=youtu.be[/youtube][/spoiler] [spoiler=FEATURES] - Working weapon sounds - Working weapon spec sounds - Working region/music system - Clipped 100% - All specials works - All prayers works 100% - All dupes fixed + no bugs - Quick switching system - 99% 2006 Style - Old 2006 Items,Models,Objects - No customs More comming soon...[/spoiler] [spoiler=TODO] - More weapon sounds - Spawn tab - Making advanced ::item command - More comming soon [/spoiler] [spoiler=TEAM] -Myself ( Roy Beekhuizen ) Skype: roy.beek100[/spoiler] __________________________________________________________

[center]

[spoiler=INFO]Runeforce is a oldschool style from 2006.
with 100% working combat and sounds, spawn and fight with others![/spoiler]
[spoiler=MEDIA]










[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fIkx_DLRlsE[/youtube]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nNAtjkAoO8A&feature=youtu.be[/youtube][/spoiler]

  • Working weapon sounds
  • Working weapon spec sounds
  • Working region/music system
  • Clipped 100%
  • All specials works
  • All prayers works 100%
  • All dupes fixed + no bugs
  • Quick switching system
  • 99% 2006 Style
  • Old 2006 Items,Models,Objects
  • No customs
    More comming soon…[/spoiler]
